folder: Arthur Kill Road & St. Lukes Avenue, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - St. Lukes Avenue
text:
Arthur Kill Road, at the S. E. corner of St. Lukes Avenue, showing St. Luke's Protestant Episcopal Church,
established in 1843.
June 9, 1927
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, at a later date.
May 3, 1937
P. L. Sperr

folder: Arthur Kill Road & St. Lukes Avenue, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - St. Lukes Avenue
text:
Arthur Kill Road, south side, between St. Lukes and Maguire Avenues, showing the Seguine House. Views 2 and 3 show the east side and the
rear of the house.
View 1, 2: June 9, 1927
View 3: April 30, 1929

folder: St. Lukes Avenue & Arthur Kill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: St. Lukes Avenue - Arthur Kill Road
text:
St. Lukes Avenue, south from Arthur Kill Road. On the left is seen part of St. Lukes (P.E.) Church and on the right is the church parish house. The house in the center background is on Hervey Street, where St. Lukes Avenue terr:inates.
May 3, 1937
P. L. Sperr
